musicalLanguage.description: A mysterious, atmospheric piece set in a garden at dusk. The harmony lingers in the darker shades of F# minor, with unexpected chord shifts that evoke shadows lengthening across flower beds. The left hand plays bell-like tones beneath a wandering melody.
teachingGoals: Explore minor key atmosphere and color
Practice expressive rubato in a new-age context
styleTips: Let each phrase breathe naturally with slight rubato
Bring out the bass bell tones while keeping the arpeggio soft
